title: fix some sql parse exception and ddl, dcl route logic
body:
Fixes #7918.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- fix `start slave` and `stop slave` statements parse error
- fix `set character` statement parse error
- fix `ddl` and `dcl` statement route wrong result when table without sharding rule
- fix `UnknownFormatConversionException` when sql parse error which include `%` sign

title: Remove ShardingSphereSQLParserEngine from SchemaContexts
body:
The previous ShardingSphereSQLParserEngine instance is held by DataSource scope, I just change it to static fetch which lifecycle is held by JVM scope.
The reason to hold the ShardingSphereSQLParserEngine instance is the cache for parse result. The previous SQL parser need to use sharding rule, but we are not need it anymore in the new framework.
